com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.wifi

Class WifiAdHocManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.wifi.WifiAdHocManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.net.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pManager.ChannelListener

    public class WifiAdHocManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.net.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pManager.ChannelListener

    This class manages the Wi-Fi discovery and the pairing with other Wi-FI devices.

      • setValueGroupOwner

        public void setValueGroupOwner(int valueGroupOwner)
        Method allowing to update the Group Owner value to influence the choice of the Group Owner negotiation.
        Parameters:
        valueGroupOwner - an integer value between 0 and 15 where 0 indicates the least inclination to be a group owner and 15 indicates the highest inclination to be a group owner. A value of -1 indicates the system can choose an appropriate value.
